label: Activity Type
desc: Type of activity covered by the permit.

label: Work Description
desc: Brief description of the work that will be done under this permit. This is subject to change prior to issuance of the permit, but generally more stable if an issue date exists. Very long descriptions have been truncated.

label: Work Subclass
desc: Subclassification for type of work being proposed. Valid choices will vary depending on the permit type.

label: Project Complexity
desc: An indicator of the complexity of the project proposed. Easier projects can be issued without plan review; more complex projects generally require plan submittal and review.

label: Work Value
desc: The value of the work being proposed. The value displayed (if any) represents the best available information to date, and is subject to change as more information becomes available. Value is not collected for all permit types.

label: Application Date
desc: The date the application was accepted as a complete submittal. If no Application Date exists this generally means the application is in a very early stage.

label: Issue Date
desc: The date the application was issued as a valid permit. If an Application Date exists but no Issue Date exists, this generally means the application is still under review.

label: Final Date
desc: The date the permit had all its inspections completed. If an Issue Date exists but no Final Date exists, this generally means the permit is still under inspection.

label: Expiration Date
desc: The date the application is due to expire. Generally, this is the date by which work is supposed to be completed (baring renewals or further extensions). If no Expiration Date exists, this generally means the application is has not been issued yet.

label: Status
desc: The current status in the application/review/inspection lifecycle. Indicates the last process step that was fully completed.

label: Latitude
desc: Latitude of the worksite where permit activity occurs. May be missing for a small number of permits considered "Unaddressable"

label: Longitude
desc: Longitude of the worksite where permit activity occurs. May be missing for a small number of permits considered "Unaddressable"
